actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 103 (c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exemption from the industrial development bond provisions for certain small issues from $1 million to $5 million.

summary.text: Increases the exemption from the industrial development bond provisions for small issues from $1,000,000 to $5,000,000, under the Internal Revenue Code. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 106(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 103 (c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exemption from the industrial development bond provisions for certain small issues from $1 million to $5 million.
